hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #0# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fairy Bottle#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Zora Tunic# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that @ deserves a hug. Everyone does!

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Song of Storms#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Maze Path Third Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Goron Tunic#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree MQ After Spinning Log Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #2# major items.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that tossing a bomb will cause a Blue Bubble to go after it.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Green Rupee# and #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Megaton Hammer Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #3 Deku Scrubs#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #0# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #the Mirror Shield#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern GS Spinning Scythe Room

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombs (10 pieces)# and #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #the Key#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Fairy Bottle#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the symphony room# in the Spirit Temple protects...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Spirit Temple MQ GS Symphony Room
